thread.title: BRIEF-Argo Group Announces Acquisition Of Ariscom

title: BRIEF-Argo Group Announces Acquisition Of Ariscom

organizations.name: brief-argo group announces acquisition of ariscom
reuters) - argo group international holdings ltd

text: March 13, 2018 / 2:27 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Argo Group Announces Acquisition Of Ariscom Reuters Staff March 13 (Reuters) - Argo Group International Holdings Ltd : * ARGO GROUP ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF ARISCOM * ARGO GROUP INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS - ‍ACQUIRED ITALIAN SPECIALTY INSURER ARISCOM. EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY​ * ARGO GROUP INTERNATIONAL HOLDINGS LTD - ‍ IN COMING MONTHS, ARGOGLOBAL WILL REBRAND ARISCOM​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
